guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"ang1i","text":"Working in an Ancient DNA Laboratory","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":36}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b3hdc","text":"- All steps of this protocol prior to PCR amplification should take place in a clean room facility specifically designed for ancient DNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"79dhl","text":"- The researcher performing lab work should be dressed in correspondingly suitable lab-wear, such as:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7n38f","text":"   - full-body suit with hood (e.g., Tyvek)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"39hno","text":"   - hairnet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5usgm","text":"   - face mask","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"76q1s","text":"   - two pairs of clean gloves","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7kmaq","text":"   - clean shoes ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4tuge","text":"   - protective glasses","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"d3q8t","text":"- Sample processing and buffer/master mix preparation should be carried out in separated work benches with integrated UV irradiation (e.g. Dead Air PCR work bench)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bl43u","text":"- Surfaces and equipment should be regularly decontaminated with e.g. bleach solution or Thermofisher's DNA AWAY (or similar) and irradiated with UV.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7j7vc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"557vb","text":"Please see the following for more detailed guidance: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"eivv9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"c3rcq","text":"Llamas, B. et al., 2017. From the field to the laboratory: Controlling DNA contamination in human ancient DNA research in the high-throughput sequencing era. STAR: Science \u0026 Technology of Archaeological Research, 3(1), pp.1–14. Available at: https://doi.org/10.1080/20548923.2016.1258824.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":158,"length":53}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":242,"length":45}],"data":[]},{"key":"23tb5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fj0a3","text":"Working in an Molecular Biology Laboratory","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":42}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"eaoam","text":"- From PCR amplification onwards, all steps takes place in a standard DNA-based molecular biology lab.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bh7dp","text":"Please keep in mind the safety guidelines of your specific country and institution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7pqh9","text":"Recommendations include wearing of:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"af0ta","text":"- lab coats","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a5ea8","text":"- closed shoes and trousers","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"75m2s","text":"- safety glasses","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2k0p1","text":"- nitrile or latex gloves","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7eud5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"aihb4","text":"Definitions","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3v45d","text":"Stock-aliquot refers to a personal 'stock' (e.g. in a 50ml Falcon Tube) of reagents you can use across multiple sessions of this protocol. An 'aliquot' refers to a sub-aliquot of the stock, that is used for a single session of this specific protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6frbn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dpk10","text":"Protocol Specific Guidelines","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"aj6ts","text":"This protocol requires the use of two rooms - a dedicated PCR-free ultra-clean library building room and a standard molecular biology lab for qPCR.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"DC629742AC7F11EAA4190A58A9FEAC2A","url":"https://doi.org/10.1080/20548923.2016.1258824"}}}}
